{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TOTOLINK |model=A7000R |revision=(U) |series=AC2600 |fcc_date=08/29/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Zioncom |manuf_model=IP04349 |type=wireless router |fcc_id=X7DIP04349 |pcb_id=IP04349 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128JVSQ |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W631GG6KB-12 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7615N;MEDIATEK, ARM, MT7615N, 1738-BFSL, ACMS6T49; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7615N;MEDIATEK, ARM, MT7615N, 1738-BFSL, ACMS6T49; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=TOTOLINK_A7000R, TOTOLINK_A7000R_5G |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }}
:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''800''' Mbps - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''2600 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC2600 Ultimate Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.totolink.net/sub/product/detail.asp?product_num=100180}} The [[TOTOLINK A7000RU]] is identical except it has a USB (3.0?) port :and requires a 12V/2A power supply.
